title: Scandinavian Minimalist Haven with Smart Features in Nowy Sacz Suburbs
description: This airy four-bedroom, three-bathroom house embodies minimalist Scandinavian elegance with light-washed interiors, sleek architectural lines, and a thoughtfully open-plan design. The home stretches across 183 sqm, featuring ample natural light throughout, underpinned by beautiful hardwood floors. Embrace seamless living with an advanced smart home system, video intercom, automated gates, and full air conditioning. Pet-friendly, this serene retreat is ideal for recharging, creating, and connecting in comfort.
neighborhood_description: Set in the tranquil Suburb of Nowy Sacz, this property captures the spirit of a peaceful suburb while nestled close to waterfront spaces and echoing the town’s historic and cultural charm. Enjoy quiet, leafy streets and friendly local cafés, while the historic heart and creative district venues remain within practical reach by car. Instant highway access ensures journeys—whether for a city trip or countryside escape—are both swift and straightforward.
lifestyle_benefits: easy highway access for regional travel
target_buyer: Remote professionals, small startup founders, creative individuals, or digital nomad families seeking Scandinavian-caliber style, privacy, and top connectivity with regional access.
market_positioning: This property stands as a high-spec contemporary retreat in Nowy Sacz's peaceful suburbs, offering rarity in modern smart amenities, size, and architectural poise at an attractive price for a discerning remote work generation.
